website_summaries.verdict: Detail-oriented case with laser-cut detail. Ideal for those who want a single portfolio for a phone and credit cards.
pros: Has 3 card slots and a larger currency pocket
Strong magnetic closure stays closed, even when jostled inside a bag
Stands up on its own if you’d like to watch media on it
cons: Card slots may stretch out over time

customer_reviews.title: Product Mis-labeled
customer_reviews.text: Product marked as iphone 8Plus case. Clearly not for the PLUS sizes of phones. Even the sticker on the case itself was marked for iphone 7plus and 8 plus. NOT.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Practical and well made case
customer_reviews.text: This phone case is excellent value and perfect in workmanship. There is a TUCCH logo on the cover and back of the case. Have to say the case protects the phone very well and I particularly like the TPU inner case – it is a little soft to touch and cover roundly of the phone, plus it is slim and comfortable to carry. The pockets for cards and cash are very handy which is my most favorite of the case. The magnetic catch works perfectly and snaps closed with a good contact. Broadly I recommend this case; extremely quality product, wallet style leather iPhone case, and it keep the phone clean and gives very good protection. 10/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: hongyan lin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this case for the past 5 months and so far, it’s holding up extremely well with daily use. This is definitely a well-made product. In fact, I’ve dropped my phone a few times and surprisingly, there’s no scratch on the case or on the phone. I also love the slots for my driver’s license, insurance cards and credit cards. Highly recommended and I wouldn’t hesitate to purchase this case again.
customer_reviews.author: Siri

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, well designed wallet
customer_reviews.text: Gave to teenage daughter. She loves it. 3 months in - it's holding up very well. Conveinent to hold a few cards and cash with her phone. She doesn't seem to mind holding the wallet up to her face, but kids don't talk much on the phone, its mostily opened to text. Edit after 1 year. Still looks very nice. Held up to a rough teenager. She was constantly shoving her card in and out and after a year it began to slide out when she didn't want to so she has replaced it now. I still feel it was a great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Only one problem
customer_reviews.text: This is the second of these I’ve bought. Great to have your phone and necessary plastic in one handy grab-n-go bundle. Used the first one for years but the corners started getting a little worn. The new edition is better overall - in my opinion. The only thing I would like to see is a little more space in the fold. By the time you get a couple of credit cards, a bit of cash and ID in, its starts looking a little stuffed. Maybe I’ll see it in the next revision. I’m done
customer_reviews.author: Dead Mule, John

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a steal for the value...
customer_reviews.text: I don't often leave reviews but this phone case is by far the best case I've purchased from Amazon. The packaging was expensive looking and the case is beautiful. I've purchased many cases around the $10 price mark before - but this is definitely worth the "extra" expense. My phone feels safe and I'm able to fit 7 cards so far without the case having any issue closing. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Megan C

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, a bit thick to fit in charging dock
customer_reviews.text: The case seems nice and came well packaged. Overall my wife likes the finish. We recently also got a phone charging station so the only issue is that with the case on, it’s just too thick to fit in the slot of the charging station. I have to push a bit and I am worried the cover will be damaged over time. Overall, I think it’s a good quality but a bit pricier compared to other covers out there.
customer_reviews.author: Dad&Son DIY

customer_reviews.title: I love this case...Holding up great!
customer_reviews.text: I have this phone in my hands everyday...throw it in my pocketbook the case is holding up very well. It isn’t peeling, and the stitching is still perfect. I don’t use the wallet for my credit cards, but I have wadded some cash in there and noticed it does stretch out some from doing so. My phone stays secure in the case, doesn’t overheat. The magnet is strong, stays closed. The part that the phone goes into, is very well secured on the outer edge. Speaker isn’t blocked. Some cases people complain they can’t hear you when you take a call...this case doesn’t have that issue. It’s great. I included pics of how it looks today.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Muffled my voice
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look and feel of this case; however, every person I was talking to on my phone while in the case said I sounded muffled. I thought it was a problem with my connection first, but then I did about 8 tests of phone in case and phone out of case. There was a direct correlation. Had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Stein

customer_reviews.title: Well made....just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: The case is very well made and seems like it will protect my iphone 8 plus ....phone fits perfectly! Looks more expensive than what I paid. Very pleased so far...just got the case a few days ago. I received it overnight and packaging was excellent
customer_reviews.author: Debra Pitsenbarger

customer_reviews.title: Using with an iPhone 8 Plus
customer_reviews.text: My work purchased an iPhone 8 Plus for me as my primary work phone. I wanted a case that I could close and drop into my laptop bag, but I didn't want to spend much money. This case fit the bill perfectly. I can confidently put the phone in my bad and not worry about scratching the screen. Case looks good and fits the iPhone 8 Plus. I'm not sure how much "drop" protection it provides, but I don't need any. Still a very solid purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Concerned Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Very appealing and pretty in pink
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this phone case for my mother as a gift and she was thrilled with it! It keeps the phone secure with a very attractive case, that allows for debit and credit cards. It feels very smooth not to mention very comfortable. I like how the magnetic closure keeps the phone and cards protected. I purchased a pink case for her Ipad and wanted to get something that matched for her phone. She is very happy with this gift and it makes me happy that she likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Loves Reviews

customer_reviews.title: For picky people
customer_reviews.text: It is better than I expected. I am allergic to new furnitures, new mattress because of its odor which I think it is made of cheap materials. This phone case has the least and almost no odor which is good for someone like me. I would recommend it to anyone. It is the best phone case I have purchased. I think it should be appeared on top of the amazon search results for phone case. Happy purchase, really!
customer_reviews.author: Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Better than some of the more expensive models out there
customer_reviews.text: Better than some of the more expensive models out there. I had one of the high dollar covers and it broke in about a year, this cover is a much better value and I would estimate equal or better construction. Highly recommend, if my case ever breaks I’m sticking with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: So far I am impressed
customer_reviews.text: Just received today but so far very satisfied. I would give 5 stars except that it was made in China. I try not to buy China made but could not find phone case. With that said, case appears well made and magnet seems strong and even holds cover when folded back. Very soft feel. Nice lining. I also chose the case because the piece that holds the phone goes all the way around top and bottom. I had purchased a Navor but it did not completely enclose the case and the magnet was weak and cover slid around. So returned and chose this brand.
customer_reviews.author: book lover

customer_reviews.title: Fine Quality Product - But I forgot that 8 and 8S are different sized variants.
customer_reviews.text: Wrong size - NOT the vendor's fault. I did not realize that beginning with iP7, iPhones come in different sizes within a generation. My friend needed just a regular 8 case, not 8s. I feel it is best to take the device to a store to guarantee the correct size, but sadly, stores are stocking fewer and fewer phone cases/holsters, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Chris - CT USA

customer_reviews.title: Fits an iPhone 8!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a case when I first got my 8, and while it said it fit, it didn’t. This one is cut to actually fit the 8 (which is just slightly different from the 7 at the bottom), so you don’t have to worry about not being able to charge or talk on your phone. It also works with a wireless charger, so bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Julesie_O

customer_reviews.title: Good protection
customer_reviews.text: This was a xmas gift for my husband. So far so good! He had this brand before on an older phone and it was great. It's very sleek and functional. Some may not like the magnetic tab as it does stick out, but he has it in and out of his pockets all day long, conducting business. Good value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: trixieboo

customer_reviews.title: She Loves It
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this case for my wife and she really loves this case. The leather has a soft feel while providing protection for the phone. The case feels well built and seems to be of excellent quality. The warranty card that comes with the phone says the case has a lifetime warranty. All ports are easily accessible and fits perfectly in the hand.
customer_reviews.author: Gary R.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and attractive
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my new iPhone 8-plus. It fits perfectly and is better than the one I had for my Android. It feels more solid and the magnetic clasp works well and is very nice. I can't believe people pay 2X this much for a cheap piece of plastic that doesn't even protect the screen. I can fit 2-3 credit cars and some folding money in the billfold part. Feels like real leather.
customer_reviews.author: Modan G.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, well made, durable, good value.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for a different portfolio case that I wore out in about 6 months at work in a machine shop. Thicker. Stronger. Leather. Three card slots and wallet type slot behind them. My favorite part is the Magnet closure. It won’t break in your pocket like snap closures will. Also, a nice, middle of the back of phone creased leather allows more ways of “propping” your phone than standard portfolio cases. Great product at a great price !
customer_reviews.author: D*man

customer_reviews.title: Looks high end
customer_reviews.text: I like it, the color looks legit. Not like those fake brown that you see on dollar stores. The only thing I’m concerned if the magnet it has to close the wallet. I noticed my screen flickering when I would close it a little. In my opinion it has a thick magnet for a phone case, it should be thinner to avoid screen and card damage.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Durable & Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: This case is very good quality with nice inside pockets for my credit card, id and or coupons. As well the inside has a cursive engravement that states "Take The World" which I hadn't noticed upon purchasing. It secures and protects my iPhone great.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Good design
customer_reviews.text: Have to give this a 4 only because the magnetic strap should be 1/2 inch longer because when cards (license, credit card insurance card and Sams Card) are placed in the wallet they bulk up in the middle and the strap is too short so it pops open
customer_reviews.author: Just keeping businesses honest with truthful reviews

customer_reviews.title: Good price and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Does it’s job. Keeps the phone protected. Looks and feels nice. Not bad for the price. Just got it a few days ago, and have been taking it in and out of the case. It seems pretty durable. I will update the review if there are and problems. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Hitgirlk

customer_reviews.title: Fails/falls when trying to use as stand to watch videos
customer_reviews.text: I love the color! The magnet is strong and the card holder holds firmly in place, what it doesn’t do so well is using it as a stand for watching videos, have only had this a short time and it really never worked from day one. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the Black & Burgundy. Very impressed with them! The cases they came in were elegant and well presented, with cards of authenticity. They appear sturdy and durable and we highly recommend! We ordered them for our IPhone 7 Plus.
customer_reviews.author: bam

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking
customer_reviews.text: The product looks nice but the magnet is not very strong. Was unable to put a few cards on the left side and tuck a dollar into the back pocket. I have a Michael Kors of the same style that is much more usable. I realize this is an inexpensive phone clutch but if the magnet won’t stay closed , irs not very useful
customer_reviews.author: Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Color is Not HOT PINK
customer_reviews.text: Received my phone case today. I order HOT PINK and it's not. It's dark mauve. Disappointed but keeping it because I need a case. Just be aware it's not a hot pink color and looks nothing like the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handsome and practical
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to prevent my phone from "butt dialing"and doing other things accidentally when in my pocket or purse. It works very well. I haven't had an accidental triggering of anything since I put it on my phone.
customer_reviews.author: humorlover

customer_reviews.title: The leather feels good. My only complaint is that the magnet on ...
customer_reviews.text: Lovely iPhone case. The leather feels good. My only complaint is that the magnet on the strap is very weak. Fortunately, that's remedied with a velcro dot under the tap; now I don't have to worry about it coming loose in my purse.
customer_reviews.author: C. Greene

customer_reviews.title: Nice case
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this case as a gift. I was so impressed with the quality, I ordered another for myself. It looks and feels like real leather (not cheap plastic) and the magnet is very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal G

customer_reviews.title: High value - low price!
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace my phone on my way out of town and I was desperate for a durable case, fast! This arrived at my hotel and was exactly as described. I lugged it through daily rainstorms, through several meetings and some site-seeing. It handled the trip fabulously! The magnet is super strong and the case can prop the phone up for some movie streaming, too! I highly recommend this case!
customer_reviews.author: akat cec

customer_reviews.title: Good proection
customer_reviews.text: Saves my iPhone when I drop it or when I have it in my pocket with keys. I am on my third one, having gone through two with my last iphone (they get dirty)--they work well for me so I keep buying them. Having pockets is a plus, and I stick the metal plate inside the back from my car magnetic phone holder. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: R. Powlus

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. The screen is always protected and it looks great. I bought a bright color so I could find it in my purse or wherever I have left it around the house. The case fits well and is durable. The little pockets inside are handy, too.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Where it is made
customer_reviews.text: Was happy with the case BUT THEN SEEN IT was made in China if I didn’t need it so bad I’d of sent back won’t buy again because I’m not buying anything from China will pay more for USA items
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small and not for plus line
customer_reviews.text: This case was nice but too small for the 8 plus. It is for a regular sized phone and not the plus line.
customer_reviews.author: ReenieC

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Fits my phone well. Able to charge with case on. No problems with sounds it is a nice case and works well. Holds some money and cards. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Very good,but some dislikes
customer_reviews.text: I like this phone case becuz it protects my phone correctly! It has a tight fitting to protect the phone.The only thing that I dislike about it is that the actually case is just plastic,but overall the leather is smooth.I would like it if they came with more variety of colors.
customer_reviews.author: Thu Dan Thi Vo

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, really liked it
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, really liked it. But color in person seems slightly darker than the picture. However, everything after that is perfect, I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Faith N

customer_reviews.title: Great Wallet Phone Cover
customer_reviews.text: I’m very pleased with my new Wallet/Phone Cover. It fits all my cards, license, etc. and cash. It has an opening in the back for my camera lens. I bought it for my iPhone 8+.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: I bought one about a year
customer_reviews.text: After a year it started to fall apart. Seams began to fray & corners started to bend quite a bit. I contacted the seller to ask what was covered under their so called warranty. Finally after waiting 2 weeks or a response I gave up and threw it away. The seller did finally contact me via email. Too late
customer_reviews.author: cliff

customer_reviews.title: Great case, you won’t regret
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful case for a great price! My husband loves it and it looks very nice with his phone. It even had the hole to allow Siri to be used while the cover is closed, something his old and much more expensive case didn’t have.
customer_reviews.author: Des

customer_reviews.title: Case Doesn’t Work Well for an IPhone 8 Plus
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this case in teal blue. The slots are nice for storing business cards, etc. What I don’t like about it is that it doesn’t fit securely around my iPhone 8 Plus. It is too big for my phone. If I am not careful when I am holding my phone it easily slips out of this case,
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Secure your phone.
customer_reviews.text: The color is exactly like the photo in the add. Magnetic closure. Holds 3 credit cards. Keeps your phone protected if you drop it. Perfect
customer_reviews.author: pebbles

customer_reviews.title: I bought one for mom last year and she liked the case very much
customer_reviews.text: This is the second case I have purchased from TUCCH. I bought one for mom last year and she liked the case very much, and then this tine I buy the case for myself. Obviously the case has some feature. -can hold couple of cards. -can still close properly. -looks smart and feels durable. All in all , a great choice for your phone and an ideal gift for your friends.
customer_reviews.author: Winny

customer_reviews.title: awesome case
customer_reviews.text: Got this case for my mom, came in and looked and felt of high quality! Wasn't sure of what to expect but definitely happy, awesome product, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Nestor H

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted this to work out but nobody could hear me when I was on my iPhone! I had to take it out of the case to talk on the phone... got no time for that!
customer_reviews.author: cjnv

customer_reviews.title: Purchased red, it is more burgundy; very disappointing ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased red, it is more burgundy; very disappointing, was supposed to match other items. Also, the sleep/wake button is covered by the black rubber(?) rim of the interior case, hard to locate, hard to press. All other descriptions and cut-outs are accurate for the iPhone 8 plus.
customer_reviews.author: Seniorlady

customer_reviews.title: Great phone wallet
customer_reviews.text: Case is sturdier than expected and fits perfectly on I phone 8. Magnet closure is easy to open and folds back when you need to use the phone. Got the pink color which is more salmon than pink. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: JRP47

customer_reviews.title: It certainly looks good.
customer_reviews.text: The phone case comes packaged in a nice box and a cloth sleeve. I like the quality of the leather and the stitching. The case seems to be well-made, and I like the slots for cash and cards. I haven’t had this long enough to vouch for the durability, but it seems pretty sturdy. I am planning to buy another one in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: P.

customer_reviews.title: Its well made
customer_reviews.text: I think this case is terrific. I did not rate the security because I wasn't aware it had any. It did not come with any information. I don't really care- what a value. Would buy it again in a minute.
customer_reviews.author: maria Mahmoud

customer_reviews.title: Love This Phone Case
customer_reviews.text: Loving this phone case! Screen is protected and magnetic closure is secure. The color is not “red” but rather a brick red. I’ve only had it a few months, so can’t comment on durability. I have high hopes, though. I found this phone through an Amazon recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Writing Soul

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about it, will be the only cell phone case that I will ever use. I’ve accidentally dropped it several times and It gave me extra protection from cracking the screen. I rep this product
customer_reviews.author: Irene Windett

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone case. Excellent price and excellent quality of leather. Warning though, don’t use the pockets for your credit cards, they will demagnetize.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Bout this for my husband and he absolutely loved the fact that the phone case can store his money and debit cards
customer_reviews.author: YM

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: This case has saved my phone on several occasions. I wouldn't have a phone without the protection of a case like this. I can also keep credit cards. I would purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Best Thing I have Bought in My Lifetime!
customer_reviews.text: This iPhone wallet case is absolutely perfect. Whoever designed it is a genius. It is missing nothing, believe me. I had been searching on line for iPhone cases, which is not a good description of what I wanted. Fortunately I mentioned my quest to a friend and she showed me her TUCCH iPhone Wallet Case. And the rest is history.
customer_reviews.author: ConsumeR

customer_reviews.title: Hard to close once the phone and a few cards were put in.
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t feel like real leather. Too heavy. Didn’t want to close. I’m returning it
customer_reviews.author: foylene spain

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the part that the phone slips into is rubber and not plastic. It’s so much easier to take in and out. I don’t have to worry about chipping the plastic.
customer_reviews.author: alaine b.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking case that works well
customer_reviews.text: Hubby inherited my iPhone 7 Plus when I upgraded to iPhone 11 Pro and so I bought this case for him. He really likes it! Nice quality and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Marc & Julie B | RVLove

customer_reviews.title: Love the Look!
customer_reviews.text: Love this case! I purchased it in navy and it looks both smart n elegant. It protects my phone nicely. The magnetic closure is awesome. It’s handy that when I’m running around, I can slip my license in the ‘wallet’ part.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Nice Wallet
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 7plus perfectly. I had one that finally wore out after 18 months so it's a durable product.
customer_reviews.author: Ruralroute2

customer_reviews.title: Great cell phone case for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with the phone case, it fits my cell phone perfectly—since I just got it, I can’t really rate the durability, but hoping it will last a while. Received within 2 days of ordering—talk about a speedy delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite phone case EVER.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this phone case! Why have I not had one of these sooner? I’m a busy Mom and drop my phone all the time. I’ve broken my screen a couple times. But this case protects my screen (and corners) when dropped better than any other phone case I’ve ever had, including Otter.
customer_reviews.author: J. W. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: purchased the light brown case for my father, and it is gorgeous in person. It is definitely worth the buy if you want a simple yet elegant phone case. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Viri Zavala

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this case ! SO easy to clean And durable! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: connie simmons

customer_reviews.title: False advertising- not worth losing your credit cards
customer_reviews.text: I don’t recommend this item unfortunately. The credit card slots don’t hold their shape and all my cards fell out and had to be replaced. The item states it ha a lifetime warranty, but they don’t respond to any messages with a request for a replacement. I recommend to avoid this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality product. Well made and color is rich - not gaudy (red). I rated it 4 only because it did not have a window pocket for drivers license. That aside, I love this phone case.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: It fits my IPhone perfectly. The magnet is strong and it is really durable. I have had it a few months now and still holding up great
customer_reviews.author: Team Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Great protection
customer_reviews.text: Great secure case. Negative s that it hard to open and answer the phone one handed if carrying something. Great for carrying credit cards or some cash.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D. Henk

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought it a few months ago & it’s still holding up. Super handy, especially when I don’t feel like carrying a purse, which is most of the time. Good looking case.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Incredible value- blown away by quality and sturdiness.
customer_reviews.text: I never leave product reviews. I will keep this short... I cannot imagine a better phone case for anything under $80. Blown away by the value. The stitching on this case is impressive and no mistakes have been made in the crafting. I can tel it is sturdy and I feel like I am holding a quality piece of leather in my hand when I use this case! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Jadon

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend it definitely
customer_reviews.text: Britney hip is good blood till one for myself and one for a family member so both of us are satisfied. But text well and the stand feature is exceptional definitely recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Orlando

customer_reviews.title: Don’t like the shade of the red
customer_reviews.text: I do like the case but the color is not the red that’s show in the picture it’s look more burgundy than red
customer_reviews.author: Gladys Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It's very durable. convenient. Doesnt add much bulk at all. If something damaged it, I'd buy another just like it to replace it!
customer_reviews.author: R. C. Young

customer_reviews.title: Great style case
customer_reviews.text: Love this style phone case. Just enough to carry a few needed things and fit in my pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Linda9130

customer_reviews.title: Saved my behind from another cracked screen
customer_reviews.text: Saved my phone many times from the screen cracking not to mention I don’t have to bring my whole purse with me all the time, I really love the pocket and card slots!
customer_reviews.author: Alanna Workman

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Needing something sturdy that would protect phone plus carry a few credit cards and ID. It's perfect! Bought the same thing with Coach that was close to $100 and it was a piece of junk which they would not take back. This is so much better for 1/3 of the price of Coach. Will definitely purchase again when I update my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Simmons

customer_reviews.title: I love this phone case beautiful color sturdy made
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone case beautiful color sturdy made. The only reason for four stars is the magnet is so heavy it picks up metal things in my purse - lol.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: reliable case
customer_reviews.text: I love the magnetic flap, I dont have to hold it while talking. The case covers all the phone and is strong.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Security and less chance of scratching screen!!!
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT 👌..... I chose a luggage brown this time so it would last longer..(even though Bright colors are easy to locate in a handbag!!!👍🏻).
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M Hansen

customer_reviews.title: My mum loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: Look great on her phone, rather elegant no issues at all
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Design & Packaging
customer_reviews.text: Though we just received our cases, we are thoroughly impressed with the packaging/delivery and the quality of the case. We have paid significantly more for what we believed to be a quality product however this design seems to be much better. The packing alone is worth a look. Very sleek and elegant! No....I did not receive this as a promotion for my review, I just value quality presentation and TUCCH hit the nail on the head!
customer_reviews.author: Reni D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for protecting your phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these to protect my iPhone because within one day of owning my phone I dropped it several times. This product is awesome...my husband saw mine and liked it so much he ordered one for his phone, also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great design !
customer_reviews.text: Great case! It is sturdy and lightweight and a good protector for my phone which I’ve already dropped twice! I like that the cover is magnetized so it stays firmly attached when folded back.
customer_reviews.author: kanga roo

customer_reviews.title: Great Case
customer_reviews.text: Well made and looks nice. Great product to combine my wallet and phone together so I have less to keep track of and carry.
customer_reviews.author: Jason & Damon

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and Complex
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this cover for a year now and I LOVE IT! It has been perfect for me. The only dislike is I wish it had a holder for a small stylish in the fold... other than that I love the feel and the protection it has given my I phone!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Chalker-Smith

customer_reviews.title: ... using this for a couple of months and I love it! So nice to just grab my phone ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for a couple of months and I love it! So nice to just grab my phone and know my license and debit card are always with me.
customer_reviews.author: A. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, durable only issue I have is when there’s anything loose in my purse, like coins or berets they stick to the magnet closure! But other than that I like it
customer_reviews.author: Dulce

customer_reviews.title: Great product...but when talking on phone others can see wallet.
customer_reviews.text: I love the design and color. Very durable. Flexible, yet firm in places it should be. Great quality product. Only thing I wish I would have paid attention to (and was clearly in the video available on listing) was the fact the wallet side is exposed anytime I’m on my phone. Just not very safe in my opinion to have my license, credit cards and cash in view.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality. Very protective case. I love the slots for credit cards and $. The magnet on it is strong enough for my phone to stick to the refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie kalis

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but not roomy
customer_reviews.text: There's not a lot of give in the material to make room for cash and cards, but on the whole it's sturdy and attractive. Just don't expect it to completely replace a wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Herlyn

customer_reviews.title: great case
customer_reviews.text: not good for fast charger case too heavy have to remove case to charge
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Clerie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, can’t be beat
customer_reviews.text: I can’t rave enough about this leather phone case by Tucch. The durability of this item is unsurpassed. My husband has had his case for 2 years and has no issues, so I decided to purchase one myself, I couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Angela T

customer_reviews.title: Very functional. Cant see myself going back
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed the wallet, only slight issue is that you can't fold the case and take a picture at the same time, not the end of the world and not even worth subtracting a star. I like the case a lot
customer_reviews.author: Lucas mcwhirter

customer_reviews.title: It fits well
customer_reviews.text: Love the fastest delivery Well fits on iPhone 8 Money well spent
customer_reviews.author: sunny

customer_reviews.title: A must have if you are always on the go.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why Inotbpurchased this case for my phone Years ago. This is soooo awesome. I have saved so much time by not having to search for my credit card. I love this all in one wallet phone case.
customer_reviews.author: Carole

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and fits iPhone 7 plus
customer_reviews.text: The case that goes around my iPhone 7 Plus can’t be removed from the wallet. My old wallet holder- you could remove it. However, I like this case and the wallet is still magnetic and the lake blue color is really pretty. This is a good quality wallet holder.
customer_reviews.author: Duke fan

customer_reviews.title: Every girl needs one!
customer_reviews.text: Like everything! Makes me know my screen is always safe in my purse or pocket or in car. Can’t break covered up. Magnet closure is great! Easy to get in and out of case!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: TUCCH iPhone 8 Plus Case, iPhone 7 Plus Wallet Case, Magnetic Closure Card Slot Money Pouch, Stand PU Leather Purse Flip Book Cover [TPU Interior Case] Compatible with iPhone 8 Plus/7 Plus, Hot Pink
product_meta.description:
Color:Hot PinkNote: This case ONLY COMPATIBLE WITH iPhone 8 Plus 5.5 inch/ iPhone 7 Plus 5.5 inch. DO NOT FIT iPhone 8/iPhone 7 4.7 inch.



Features: 
★High-quality synthetic leather for flip case style, top-grade hand feeling 
★Folio book design adding styles from every details for iPhone 8/7 plus 
★Separate slots for your ID and cards, as well as a pocket for cash 
★Slim profile provides a sleek look and also converting your iPhone 8/7 plus for hands-free viewing 
★Integrated magnet closure preventing the flap from moving around as well as protecting the screen 
★Precise cutouts provide easy access to all buttons, ports & camera 
★Impeccable craftsmanship and styling. This would be a great gift idea as it comes within a nice box. 

Package includes: 
1 x Leather wallet case for iPhone 8 Plus / iPhone 7 plus 5.5 inch 
1 x retail packaging(Come in a TUCCH gift box) 


[LIFETIME WARRANTY]: In order to pursue a higher customer experience satisfaction, all leather cases sold by our store are covered with LIFETIME WARRANTY. If any non-artificial quality problems, please feel free to contact us.
feature_bullets: DESIGN: The TUCCH iPhone 8 Plus leather Case is a perfect fit for your iPhone 8 Plus / iPhone 7 Plus 5.5-inch only! DO NOT fit iPhone 8/7 4.7-inch. Our handmade design gives that classic feel while offering a left-turning cover and a perfectly-curved case without rough edges or trimmings. We designed our case to exemplify the power and beauty of simplicity.

MULTIFUNCTION: (1). Included 3 card slots and 1 money pocket, carry around your credit and debit cards, and cash without having to take your wallet with you. (2). You can stand the phone up to watch something hands-free. (3). Magnetic flap to keep it closed and protected, secure magnetic closure.

COMPREHENSIVE PROTECTION: The iPhone 8 Plus flip wallet leather case covers all corners and provides great dual-layer protection to your smartphone. The durable soft TPU full-body inner case comes with a cushioned shockproof edge and ensures your phone against drops and bumps.

NEVER OUT OF TREND: Beautifully crafted in classic low profile design. Feels great in the hand and has a smooth button action on iPhone 7 Plus book case cover. Suitable for everyday life and business trip. Engineered to emphasize thinness without compromising Phone security. Precise cutouts give you full access to ports, and sensitive button covers allow responsive presses.

[LIFETIME WARRANTY]: In order to pursue a higher customer experience satisfaction, all leather cases sold by TUCCH are covered with LIFETIME WARRANTY. If any non-artificial quality problems, please contact us to get a new replacement free of charge or refund.
